name: ListTile
desc: A single fixed-height row that typically contains some text as well as a leading or trailing icon.

fields.name: leading
fields.desc: A widget to display before the title.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary content of the list tile.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.desc: Additional content displayed below the title.

fields.name: trailing
fields.desc: A widget to display after the title.

fields.name: isThreeLine
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is intended to display three lines of text.

fields.name: dense
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.dense} Whether this list tile is part of a vertically dense list.

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the list tile's layout will be.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.shape} Defines the tile's [InkWell.customBorder] and [Ink.decoration] shape. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: selectedColor
fields.desc: Defines the color used for icons and text when the list tile is selected.

fields.name: iconColor
fields.desc: Defines the default color for [leading] and [trailing] icons.

fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: Defines the text color for the [title], [subtitle], [leading], and [trailing].

fields.name: titleTextStyle
fields.desc: The text style for ListTile's [title].

fields.name: subtitleTextStyle
fields.desc: The text style for ListTile's [subtitle].

fields.name: leadingAndTrailingTextStyle
fields.desc: The text style for ListTile's [leading] and [trailing].

fields.name: style
fields.desc: Defines the font used for the [title].

fields.name: contentPadding
fields.desc: The tile's internal padding.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is interactive.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when the user taps this list tile.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: Called when the user long-presses on this list tile.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.inkwell.onFocusChange}

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: selected
fields.desc: If this tile is also [enabled] then icons and text are rendered with the same color.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the tile's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color for the tile's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The color of splash for the tile's [Material].

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: tileColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.tileColor} Defines the background color of `ListTile` when [selected] is false.

fields.name: selectedTileColor
fields.desc: Defines the background color of `ListTile` when [selected] is true.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.enableFeedback} Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: horizontalTitleGap
fields.desc: The horizontal gap between the titles and the leading/trailing widgets.

fields.name: minVerticalPadding
fields.desc: The minimum padding on the top and bottom of the title and subtitle widgets.

fields.name: minLeadingWidth
fields.desc: The minimum width allocated for the [ListTile.leading] widget.

fields.name: minTileHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ListTile.minTileHeight} The minimum height allocated for the [ListTile] widget.

fields.name: titleAlignment
fields.desc: Defines how [ListTile.leading] and [ListTile.trailing] are vertically aligned relative to the [ListTile]'s titles ([ListTile.title] and [ListTile.subtitle]).

fields.name: internalAddSemanticForOnTap
fields.desc: Whether to add button:true to the semantics if onTap is provided. This is a temporary flag to help changing the behavior of ListTile onTap semantics.
